title: My installer is not working
body:
I download the installer and when I click to open it,  don´t  appear  nothing . I already try to run as admin and check out another forums. I´m using Windows Vista. I would greatly appreciate any help. 
PS:This is happening when i try to install another programs (not all).

replies.body: Try disabling your antivirus as well, if that doesn't work reply again and we'll dig deeper.

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)


http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
I done it and it´s working.Thx very much

Welcomed. :) Glad you were able to get it fixed. Have a Splash on the Fields of Justice!

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m7alwxVDQQ4/VXsRUvD21VI/AAAAAAAArXs/xz9GF6oweYY/s1600/pool_party_201_splash_1920.jpg

Are you installing on an admin account? If so, can you try using this [alternative installer](https://riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net/ShellInstaller/EUW/LeagueofLegends_EUW_Installer_9_15_2014.exe) for your region?

Let me know if anything changes.
This is likely due to your firewall blocking the installation. Try disabling your firewall and let us know if it works.
